flounder.devices

Class DeviceSound

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.devices.DeviceSound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModule

    public class DeviceSound
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModule
    An Sound Device implemented using OpenAL.

        public Vector3f getCameraPosition()
        Gets the cameras position.
        Returns:
        The cameras position.

      • play3DSound

        public AudioController play3DSound(PlayRequest playRequest)
        Plays a sound that should be emitted from somewhere in the 3D world.
        Parameters:
        playRequest - The request containing the sound and all the settings for the playing of the sound.
        Returns:
        The controller for the source which plays the sound. Returns null if no source was available to play the sound.

      • playSystemSound

        public AudioController playSystemSound(Sound sound)
        Send a request to play a system sound effect at full volume. The request is sent to the SourcePoolManager which will find a source to play the sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound to be played.
        Returns:
        The controller for the playing of this sound.

      • getStreamManager

        public StreamManager getStreamManager()
        Gets the sound stream manager.
        Returns:
        The sound stream manager.

      • getMusicPlayer

        public MusicPlayer getMusicPlayer()
        Gets the background music player.
        Returns:
        The background music player.
